at.irian.ankor.context

Interface ModelContextManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultModelContextManager, SingletonModelContextManager

    public interface ModelContextManager
    The ModelContextManager handles all ModelContexts that are currently active. "Active" means that an application (i.e. user session) is currently connected to this model.
    Author:
    Manfred Geiler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ModelContext getOrCreate(String modelContextId)
      Get the ModelContext with the given id.

      Invalidate (i.e.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrCreate

        ModelContext getOrCreate(String modelContextId)
        Get the ModelContext with the given id. Create a new ModelContext (by means of a ModelContextFactory) if there is none with this id yet.
        Parameters:
        modelContextId - model id
        Returns:
        the existing (or a newly created) ModelContext with the given id

      • invalidate

        void invalidate(ModelContext modelContext)
        Invalidate (i.e. close) the given ModelContext. ModelContextManager implementations must call the ModelContext.close() method on the given instance and remove any reference to the ModelContext.
        Parameters:
        modelContext - ModelContext to invalidate
